translations: 给…提供林阴大街；把…建成林阴大街

sentences.sentence: Rush to the boulevard to meet and greet the tourists.
sentences.translation: 冲到林荫大道去迎接游客。

sentences.sentence: Why did the animal activists gather on Hollywood Boulevard?
sentences.translation: 为什么动物保护者们聚集在好莱坞大道上？

sentences.sentence: When "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" was first shown to the public last month, a group of excited animal activists gathered on Hollywood Boulevard.
sentences.translation: 上个月，当《人猿星球的崛起》首次向公众放映时，一群兴奋的动物保护者聚集在好莱坞大道上。
